ai-vv67:1.1_0: “This one whose mind is freed from stones,
ai-vv67:1.3_0: While the seven peaks there are seven gamblings,
ai-vv67:1.4_0: covetousness is like noble crystal lamps,
ai-vv67:2.1_0: There you eat the food and drink.
ai-vv67:2.3_0: Eight years in the eighth training,
ai-vv67:2.4_0: Chief Divine Hells these (orts) of various kinds:
ai-vv67:3.3_0: Whose mind is not developed like this?
ai-vv67:4.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv67:4.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv67:5.1_0: A gift one gives to fruit,
ai-vv67:5.2_0: You should give to confidence in the people,
ai-vv67:5.3_0: He rejoices in Heaven, he is one who goes to heaven.
ai-vv67:5.4_0: riches for the fruit of good deeds,
ai-vv67:6.2_0: to whom you gave the fourth fruit.
ai-vv67:7.4_0: a human being is all envious.
ai-vv67:8.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv67:9.1_0: the third drunk of the fruit,
